title: CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string contains any of the specified compare_strings, ignoring case differences. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The source string to search within.

parameters.name: ...compare_strings
parameters.description: One or more strings to search for within the source string.

examples:
CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE("Annual Financial Review 2024", "Quarterly", "financial")
-- Returns TRUE ("financial" matches, case-insensitive).

CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE(Subject, "Urgent", "ASAP")
-- Returns TRUE if Subject contains "Urgent" or "ASAP" in any case; otherwise, returns FALSE.
